Classes/AnimatedImageView.html#/s:10King.name: runLoopMode
Classes/AnimatedImageView.html#/s:10King.abstract: The animation timer’s run loop mode. Default is NSRunLoopCommonModes. Set this property to NSDefaultRunLoopMode will make the animation pause during UIScrollView scrolling.
